doc:
Arny Freeman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arny_Freeman 0 Arny Freeman (August 28, 1908 —February 13, 1986) was a Chicago-born American character actor. He appeared in commercials, television series episodes, Broadway plays, and motion pictures; he was also credited as Arnie Freeman and as Arnold Freeman. He was interviewed in Studs Terkel’s Working. Arny_Freeman ( August_28_,_1908 — February_13_,_1986 ) was a_Chicago-born_American_character_actor . He appeared in commercials , television_series_episodes , Broadway plays , and motion_pictures ; he was_also_credited as Arnie_Freeman and as Arnold_Freeman . He was_interviewed in Studs_Terkel ’s_Working .
